article_title: Can GOP Tap Into Millennials' Frustrations?

article_metadata.author: Dale Buss

og.description: The Republican Party could be on to something with its embrace of Uber and other car-sharing services in their battle with union-dominated, bureaucracy-laden taxicab fleets in major American cities. But the GOP needs to do other, similar things to tap into Millennials' economic frustrations as well and to stoke a [...]
